Officer.Name: thomas c holleran
Officer.Title: VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE AND CFO

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE INSTITUTE FOR SHIPBOARD EDUCATION ADMINISTERS THE SEMESTER AT SEA EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM OF UNIVERSITY CREDIT STUDY INCORPORATING DIRECT CONTACT WITH DIFFERENT CULTURES AND FIELD STUDY
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE INSTITUTE FOR SHIPBOARD EDUCATION ADMINISTERS THE SEMESTER AT SEA EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM OF UNIVERSITY CREDIT STUDY INCORPORATING DIRECT CONTACT WITH DIFFERENT CULTURES AND FIELD STUDY
IRS990.Description: THE INSTITUTE FOR SHIPBOARD EDUCATION ORGANIZES & ADMINISTERS THE EDUCATIONAL SEMESTER AT SEA PROGRAM. UNDERGRAD STUDENTS TAKE COLLEGE LEVEL COURSES IN CONJUNCTION WITH TRAVELING THE WORLD FOR A SEMESTER.THE INSTITUE PLANS TWO VOYAGES TO COINCIDE WITH THE TRADITIONAL SEMIANNUAL SEMESTERS OFFERED BY MOST UNIVERSITIES, AS WELL AS A SUMMER VOYAGE. THE PROGRAM IS ACADEMICALLY SPONSORED BY THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA AND ADMINISTERED BY THE INSTITUTE.

OtherExpenses.Description: COST OF U OF VIRGINIA C

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: SEMESTER AT SEA IS A LEARNING ADVENTURE DESIGNED TO TRANSFORM STUDENTS OF EVERY RACE, COLOR, AND CREED INTO A CITIZEN AND SCHOLAR OF THE WORLD.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: THE ENROLLMENT MANAGEMENT DEPARTMENT MONITORS STUDENT COURSES TAKEN AND COMPLETED DURING THE VOYAGE AS WELL AS THEIR ATTENDANCE. INFORMATION ON STUDENT ACCOMPLISHMENTS DURING THE VOYAGE ARE MAINTAINED BY THE ENROLLMENT MANAGEMENT DEPARTMENT AS WELL.

Form990ScheduleMPartII.Explanation: NON-CASH "STOCK" CONTRIBUTIONS ARE RECEIVED INTO ONE OF ISE'S BROKERAGE ACCOUNTS HELD AT WELLS FARGO ADVISORS. THE SPECIFIC STOCK CONTRIBUTION IS THEN EITHER LIQUIDATED OR HELD UPON THE RECOMMENDATION OF THE INVESTMENT ADVISOR AT WELLS FARGO.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION OPERATES AN EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM WHEREBY STUDENTS ARE ON A SHIP AT SEA FOR A SEMESTER. THE SHIP VOYAGE ENCIRCLES THE WORLD WHILE THE STUDENTS, FACULTY AND STAFF ARE HOUSED ON THE SHIP. THE ORGANIZATION HAS ENGAGED A MANAGEMENT FIRM TO MANAGE THE SHIP'S OPERATIONS WHILE AT SEA. THE ORGANIZATION HAS ESTABLISHED POLICIES AND PROCEDURES THAT THE MANAGEMENT FIRM ADMINISTERS. REPORTS ARE SUBMITTED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S MANAGEMENT TEAM MONTHLY FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL. THE MANAGEMENT FIRM'S CONTRACT IS REVIEWED FOR RENEWAL ANNUALLY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AT EACH ANNUAL MEETING OF TRUSTEES, THE TRUSTEES SHALL ELECT FOR A TERM OF FOUR YEARS THE APPROPRIATE NUMBER OF SUCCESSORS TO THOSE TRUSTEES WHOSE TERM IS THEN EXPIRING. NEW TRUSTEE CANDIDATES ARE INTRODUCED TO THE BOARD BY CURRENT TRUSTEE MEMBERS. THE NUMBER OF MEMBERS ON THE ISE BOARD OF TRUSTEES SHALL NOT BE LESS THAN 5 NOR MORE THAN 23.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL DECISIONS ARE MADE BY MANAGEMENT AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AS OF JUNE 1, 2009,THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES HAS ESTABLISHED AN AUDIT COMMITTEE TO REVIEW THE FINANCIAL OPERATIONS OF THE ORGANIZATION AND TO INFORM THE BOARD OF THE RESULTS OF THAT REVIEW PROCESS. THE BOARD REVIEWS THE RESULTS OF THE REVIEW AND RATIFIES COMMITTEE ACTIONS WHERE IT IS APPROPRIATE TO DO SO. ONE OF THE RESPONSIBILITIES CHARGED TO THE COMMITTEE IS THE REVIEW OF FORM 990. THE PROCESS USED BY THE COMMITTEE TO FULFILL THIS RESPONSIBILITY IS AS FOLLOWS: MANAGEMENT ENGAGES A CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM TO PROVIDE MANAGEMENT WITH AN ANNUAL TRAINING SESSION ON THE CHANGES TO FORM 990 AND NEW MATTERS THAT MAY EFFECT THE PREPARATION OF THE FORM. THE FIRM IS ENGAGED TO PREPARE A DRAFT FORM 990 WHICH IS SUBMITTED TO MANAGEMENT FOR THEIR REVIEW AND APPROVAL. THE FORM APPROVED BY MANAGEMENT IS SUBMITTED TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE FOR THEIR REVIEW AND APPROVAL AS WELL. THE FORM APPROVED BY THE AUDIT COMMITTEE IS SUBMITTED TO THE BOARD WITH A RECOMMENDATION THAT THE BOARD APPROVE THE FORM FOR FILING. THE BOARD APPROVES THE FILING OF THE FORM BEFORE IT IS RELEASED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ISE DEVOTES THREE PAGES OF ITS EMPLOYEE POLICY MANUAL TO THE AREA OF "CONFLICT OF INTEREST AND BUSINESS ETHICS." EVERY FULL TIME EMPLOYEE OF ISE RECEIVES A COPY OF THIS MANUAL WHEN THEY ARE HIRED AND MUST BE ACCOUNTABLE AND ADHERE TO ALL POLICIES DURING THE EMPLOYMENT TENURE. EACH DEPARTMENT VICE PRESIDENT IS RESPONSIBLE TO ENSURE THAT ALL ISE POLICIES ARE FOLLOWED IN THEIR SPECIFIC DEPARTMENT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE PROCESS INVOLVES PERFORMING AN ANALYSIS BASED ON SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS BY VARIOUS SALARY SURVEY PUBLICATIONS AND HAVING THE PRESIDENT AND BOARD OF TRUSTEES' EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE APPROVE ALL SALARY INCREASES. THE PRESIDENT (CEO) RECUSES HIMSELF FROM ALL DELIBERATIONS REGARDING HIS COMPENSATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES COPIES OF ITS GOVERNING INSTRUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND OTHER MATTERS TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. THE INFORMATION IS PROVIDED AS QUICKLY AS POSSIBLE WITHOUT CHARGE. THE INFORMATION PROVIDED IS APPROVED BY THE CONTROLLER PRIOR TO RELEASE.

AS OF JUNE 1, 2009, INSTITUTE FOR SHIPBOARD EDUCATION HAS AN AUDIT COMMITTEE WHICH REVIEWS THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT AND THE PERFORMANCE OF THE ENGAGED CPA FIRM ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. THIS PROCESS HAS REMAINED CONSISTENT FROM YEAR TO YEAR.

Form990ScheduleRPartI.PrimaryActivities: OWNS SHIP USED FOR THE INSTITUTE FOR SHIPBOARD EDUCATION'S MISSION
